Description: A description of the required file outputs. In addition to the presence of the required files, omniValidator will also check some fields described below (e.g. file extension, 'end' field).

fields.description: A description of the required file
fields.end: File extension for this file type
fields.fields: Required fields/ attributes of the outputs.

norm_counts.description: Normalized count matrix in compressed format.

red_dim.description: Dimension reduction of the count matrix

hvg_out.description: List of genes and optional fields for highly variable genes.
hvg_out.fields: (mandatory) a 'gene_id' with Ensembl IDs, (optional) field(s) with boolean values that state whether the genes are HVG for a particular method.
